data.oai_dc:dc: Fasta input file of control region (d-loop), for inferring demographic history of the major mtDNA lineages, using the Bayesian Skyline Plot implemented in BEAST. Sequences are provided for 893 snowshoe hare (Lepus americanus) specimens collected from throughout the species’ range and 1 white-tailed jackrabbit (L. townsendii: Sample ID WTJR, GenBank accession number AY292729).
